member.name: M:Mediachase.Commerce.Plugins.Shipping.Generic.GenericGateway.GetRate(Mediachase.Commerce.IMarket,System.Guid,EPiServer.Commerce.Order.IShipment,System.String@)
member.summary: Returns the package option array when method id and package that needs to be send is passed. Use passed message string to pass errors back to the application if any occurred.
member.returns: Empty array if no results found.
